TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit StripLinesCollection extends System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartElementCollection`1<class System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine>

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLinesCollection> class represents a collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine> objects, and is implemented as the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.StripLines%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis> class.
<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine> objects can be appended, inserted or removed from the collection at both design time and run time.
**Note** Strip lines can be displayed once or repeatedly for a set interval.
